text: Indian equity benchmarks climbed, reflecting the resilient trade in Asia, led by Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. Both the S&P BSE Sensex and the NSE Nifty rose as much as 0.8 percent to 31,643.14 and 9,883.45, respectively.The market breadth was tilted in favour of the buyers. About 1,335 stocks advanced, while 239 declined on the NSE.
title: Stocks Radar: IL&FS; Engineering, Ujjivan Financial, Reliance Capital
